name: http_sdk_examples
description: FastEdge HTTP applications demonstrating SDK usage examples

scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -p build:basic build:downstream-fetch build:downstream-modify-response build:headers build:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:wasm: npm-run-all -p copy:basic copy:downstream-fetch copy:downstream-modify-response copy:headers copy:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:basic: npx cross-env NAME=http_sdk_basic npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:downstream-fetch: npx cross-env NAME=http_sdk_downstream_fetch npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:downstream-modify-response: npx cross-env NAME=http_sdk_downstream_modify_response npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:headers: npx cross-env NAME=http_sdk_headers npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:variables-and-secrets: npx cross-env NAME=http_sdk_variables_and_secrets npm run mv:file
